name: Lone Wanderer (Roger Ng, FenrixK17, Hann)
description: An AI uprising has rendered 50% of Earth’s land uninhabitable. Captain Neil is one of the last remaining humans on Earth, having been abandoned to the task of defending Earth from the AI while the other survivors escape to space. Piloting an advanced mecha called Ǝ-LLAW, he pushes through the nuclear wasteland of destroyed cities to find the AI’s core. He finds it housed in the bunker of the first city destroyed during the war. Now Captain Neil fights through hordes of tanks created by the AI. Pilot Ǝ-LLAW and defend humanity as its last Guardian.
